title: Do YOU fancy being shaken and stirred? The ULTIMATE James Bond experience in Thailand
text:
Do YOU fancy being shaken and stirred? The ULTIMATE James Bond experience in Thailand Do YOU fancy being shaken and stirred? The ULTIMATE James Bond experience in Thailand IF you like James Bond and enjoy a snazzy holiday, this could be the best of both worlds for your next trip abroad. PUBLISHED: 15:14, Tue, Oct 13, 2015 | UPDATED: 15:33, Tue, Oct 13, 2015 Lady Sarojin Lady Sarojin is hosting a fabulous James Bond themed holiday 
Luxury boutique resort, The Sarojin, has introduced the all-new James Bond Experience for thrill-seekers to be shaken and stirred in southern Thailand. 
Designed for guests who - like 007 - enjoy the finer things in life, the new experience includes the perfect dose of luxury and adventure. Related articles Bank Holiday DIY projects: How to paint, up-cycle and fill a hole... 
The Sarojin’s suave guides will lead would-be Bonds on an escapade through picture perfect Phang Nga Bay, visiting James Bond Island and travelling by luxury car and private yacht. 
The adventure begins with the aptly-named '007 Heaven' champagne breakfast in the topical surrounds of the 56-room boutique resort. Lady Sarojin The beach is simply incredible with pure white sands 
Guests will then jump aboard the Lady Sarojin luxury yacht to tour top-secret sea caves. 
The adventure roars ahead to James Bond Island, famous for its needle formed limestone rock which starred in the classic movie The Man with the Golden Gun. 
Guests can enjoy a thrilling afternoon of island-hopping as they wave through the sheer rock formations that jut out of the emerald green water. 
Then on to uncovering the mysterious depths of the underworld during a guided snorkelling activity in the crystal-clear seas. Lady Sarojin There are unbelievable treks through the jungles around the hotel Lady Sarojin The clear waters are perfect for a spot of snorkelling - also included in the price 
The day draws to a close as with a four-by-four road venture through the jungle paths surrounding The Sarojin, where the James Bond Experience culminates with a Bond-style martini at the brand new beach bar on the resort’s 11km stretch of secluded white sand beach. 
The Sarojin’ s full-day James Bond Experience is available all year round. Prices start from THB 84,500 (approximately GBP 1,550). 
The price is based on all activities listed above and six nights’ accommodation in a luxury Garden Residence including all-day á la carte breakfast with sparkling wine and return airport transfers by private car. 
It also includes the full day adventure in Phang Nga Bay aboard the luxury yacht Lady Sarojin inclusive of sea cave canoeing, snorkelling, rock climbing and with Bond style martinis served, and all taxes for two people.
